title: Moderna Works on Vaccines to Get Ahead of Covid-19 Variants
content:
1. Moderna Works on Vaccines to Get Ahead of Covid-19 Variants  Bloomberg Technology

  5. Walgreens will adjust Pfizer second dose scheduling, host two clinics in MKE  WDJT

localize.title: Moderna社は、Covid-19バリアントに先んじてワクチンに取り組んでいる。
Moderna致力于疫苗研发，抢在Covid-19变种之前。
Moderna致力於疫苗研發，搶在Covid-19變種之前。
